Custom Web Application Development: Tailored Solutions for Your Business

We Deliver Impressive and Secure Web Apps to meet your complex requirements and embark on a journey of Web App Development Excellence

Talk To Our Experts

Our Custom Web App Development Services

Deligence Technologies offers customized web application development solutions to meet your complex as well as simple requirements. Our developers with core competency in cutting-edge technologies like NodeJS, and ReactJS deliver top-performing web applications to small and big corporates. Our strategic initiatives have helped our clients globally. Our experts have enabled us to become a trusted web app services provider across the world in Healthcare, and EduTech industries.

Why Deligence Technologies For Web App Services?

Deligence Technologies is a renowned Custom Web Application Development company in Canada & India with years of experience in building world-class B2B and B2C solutions.

Throughout these years, our web app development experts have delivered robust web apps to clients overseas. We consistently gain new insights into making a web application that keeps on performing better.

Our Varied Web Application Services

Custom Web Development

We specialize in custom web app development to provide adaptive solutions tailored to your enterprise needs. Leveraging the latest web technologies, we ensure your requirements are met with cutting-edge solutions for optimal performance and scalability.

Portal Development

Â Our developed web portals prioritize smooth and secure data storage and access for end-users. We ensure a seamless experience, focusing on data security and accessibility, to provide a reliable platform for users to store and retrieve their information.

IT Managed Services

We offer to continually manage your Web App. This includes fixing the bug, upgrading the technologies to the latest releases, and taking necessary steps to ensure that the app is performing well with the increased traffic.

Cloud & IT Infrastructure

We enhance and maintain your Cloud & IT Infrastructure. We do vertical scaling, horizontal scaling, load balancing, and setting up sandbox and production environments. We prefer to set up your cloud on AWS.

Our custom web application development Technology Suite

Delivering advanced web apps is what we love to do! Our open-source web development kit designs develops, and supports all types of web apps with complete transparency and control. Our experts upgrade to the latest technology to deliver high-quality work with complete control, ongoing support, maintenance, and quality testing.

Frontend Development

We know rich user experience builds trust and boosts product adoption. Our implements web designs with stunning animations and effects that don't tradeoff performance. The web apps developed by us are fast for users on any connection.

Backend Development

At Deligence, we build a solid architecture to create a web application. Our back-end developers use and maintain the technology that powers the components of the user-facing side of the web. We have hands-on experience in using AWS cloud systems and popular technologies.

Testing

Our professional testing team ensures the app has no bugs or issues before the web launch. We continually invest in keeping web apps bugs-free to deliver predictable performance at all times.
